amendment.description: To authorize a lease of real property at Joint Base Elmendorf-Richardson, Alaska.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4086 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4086 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Murkowski.
